api_list.name: Character Details
api_list.description:
Get a Single Character by ID

Contact me on [Mridul.Tech](https://www.mridul.tech)  if you have any questions.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stranger-things-character-api.p.rapidapi.com/characters/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stranger-things-character-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
